compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0 license requires that any derivative work or combined work must also be licensed under GPL-2.0. This strong copyleft nature means that any software that incorporates GPL-2.0 licensed code must also be open-sourced under the same license.

key_requirements: Must provide the same freedoms to recipients as received.
Must not impose additional restrictions on the rights granted by the license.
Must ensure that any distributed modified versions are also licensed under GPL-2.0.
license.name: GPL-2.0
obligations: Distribute copies of the software with the same license.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the software.
Include a copy of the license with any distributed software.
State any changes made to the original software.
